name: VR/AR Wave Shooter Prototype
description:
To experience the game in AR, you need to make some changes in your oculus PC app. Follow the directions in the following link https://blog.immersive-insiders.com/oculus-passthrough-part-1/

PC Oculus Version -- Consistent 90 FPS on my PC (lower end VR capable). You can access the passthrough by connecting your Quest 2 via a link and following the instructions above. 

Quest 2 Version -- I decided not to upload the quest 2 version. The framerate was only around 25 in VR, and about 35 in AR. 

The prototype is just that. Cringey dialogue that will be rewritten. Animations that need to be finetuned. And some facial animations that are really messed up on Scarlett. Still, I would love for some people to try it out, and give me some feedback.
